biotools.summary: A completely automated pipe-line for ChIP-seq data analysis, starting from raw sequencing reads, through quality filtering, read mapping, fragment size estimation, peak calling, peak annotation and comprehensive regulatory motif analysis. It runs with data from human (hg19), mouse (mm9) or drosophila (dm3).

bioschemas.name: CRUNCH
bioschemas.summary: A completely automated pipe-line for ChIP-seq data analysis, starting from raw sequencing reads, through quality filtering, read mapping, fragment size estimation, peak calling, peak annotation and comprehensive regulatory motif analysis. It runs with data from human (hg19), mouse (mm9) or drosophila (dm3).
